RandPlay - Random File Player
=============================

This package contains two language versions:

ENGLISH VERSION:
  File: English\RandPlay_EN.exe
  Description: Full English interface

CHINESE VERSION:
  File: Chinese\RandPlay_ZH_CN.exe  
  Description: Simplified Chinese interface

USAGE:
  1. Choose your preferred language version
  2. Run the corresponding .exe file
  3. Go to File > Settings to configure directories
  4. Build index and enjoy random file playback

REQUIREMENTS:
  - Windows 10 or later
  - Administrative rights (for some directories)

For more information, see README.md
